channel.title: Offering Regalia for Trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Offering Regalia for Trade"

item.title: Re: Offering Regalia for Trade
item.content:encoded: Regalia's off the market, but I've got a K-Dog's Headband up for trade now if anyone wants to make me an offer. I'll take pretty much any Kaiju drop, a Codec, or a Dartboard for it.

item.title: Offering Regalia for Trade
item.content:encoded:
I've got an extra Regalia I'm willing to trade, please make me an offer. I'm interested primarily in Kaiju Drops and other such lovely sort of things; I'd rather not trade for large quantities of Super Potions, Smoke Bombs, etc.

I will not trade for Perfect Hair, Bear Coat, or Book of Spoilers. Nor will I trade for a Golden Collar of Wisdom. Most other Kaiju Drops and any other Golden Items are acceptable.
